email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the draft charter party for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for the laycan 15-20 October. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll review the draft charter party and revert with any comments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John
